{{Infobox person | name = Craig Fairbrass | birth_date = {{bda|1964|05|06}} | birth_place = [[Stepney]], [[London]], [[England]], [[UK]] | death_date = | birthname = | othername = | website = http://www.craigfairbrass.co.uk/ | occupation = Actor }} '''Craig Fairbrass''' (born 6 May 1964)<ref>http://www.giantbomb.com/craig-fairbrass/72-86435/</ref> is an [[England|English]] [[actor]]. He is known for his distinctive [[Cockney speech|Cockney]] accent.
==Life and career== Fairbrass was born in [[Stepney]], [[London]]. He made his acting debut in an episode of the television series ''[[Shelley (TV series)|Shelley]]'' in 1980. This was followed by appearances in series such as ''[[Emmerdale]]'', ''[[Three Up Two Down]]'' and ''[[London's Burning]]''. He has also appeared in such films as ''[[For Queen and Country]]'' with [[Denzel Washington]], and ''[[Cliffhanger (film)|Cliffhanger]]'' with [[Sylvester Stallone]].
He is well known in Britain for his appearance and portrayal of [[Dan Sullivan (EastEnders)|Dan Sullivan]] in the [[BBC]] [[soap]], ''[[EastEnders]]'' from 1999 to 2001. He went onto appear in several other television series such as ''[[Dream Team (TV series)|Dream Team]]'' where he played Terry Rose. In January 2007, Fairbrass starred in ''[[White Noise: The Light]]'' as Henry Caine. The film is a sequel to the [[Michael Keaton]] film ''[[White Noise (film)|White Noise]]''. In February 2007 he appeared as the renegade [[Jaffa (Stargate)|Jaffa]] Arkad in the episode "[[Talion (Stargate SG-1)|Talion]]" in the final season of ''[[Stargate SG-1]]''.
Most recently he starred in the film ''[[Rise of the Footsoldier]]''. He voiced "Gaz" in the videogame ''[[Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare]]'' (2007), "Ghost" in ''[[Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2]]'' (2009) and Sgt. Wallcroft in ''[[Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3]]''.<ref>[http://www.craigfairbrass.co.uk/ Craig Fairbrass - Official Site]</ref> In March 2008 he appeared in the US television series ''[[Terminator: The Sarah Connor Chronicles]]''. He stars also in the [[vampire film]] Dead Cert <ref>[http://www.fangoria.com/home/news/27-international-frights/4217-more-cast-new-poster-for-vampire-film-dead-cert.html More cast, new poster for vampire film DEAD CERT]</ref> and played alongside [[Billy Murray (actor)|Billy Murray]] in this as well as 'Freight' and 'Just For The Record,'<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.dreadcentral.com/news/37679/new-artwork-and-exclusive-stills-dead-cert|title=New Artwork and Exclusive Stills: Dead Cert|publisher=DreadCentral}}</ref> Fairbrass also worked alongside Billy Murray in Eastenders, Rise of the Footsoldier, ''Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare'' and ''Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2''. Fairbrass' most recent role was mercenary Cole opposite Danny Dyer and Jaime Murray in Mark McQueen's freerunning zombie movie [[Devil's Playground (2010 film)|Devil's Playground]].
Fairbrass is married to [[Elke Kellick]], a former [[Page Three|Page 3]] model, and they have two sons, Jack and Luke.
